alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 11:00AM EDT until March 18 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Water levels along the Green River are forecast to rise again, with Paradise returning to minor flooding Monday afternoon. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 379.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to 380.6 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall to 380.5 feet and begin rising again Wednesday morning. It will rise to 380.6 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
